parameters.name: StreamingProperties
parameters.description: The streaming properties to configure. StreamingExperiencePreferredProtocol (string) --- Indicates the type of preferred protocol for the streaming experience. UserSettings (list) --- Indicates the permission settings asscoiated with the user. (dict) --- Information about the user's permission settings. Indicates the type of action. Indicates if the setting is enabled or disabled. MaximumLength (integer) --- Indicates the maximum character length for the specified user setting. StorageConnectors (list) --- Indicates the storage connector used (dict) --- Describes the storage connector. The type of connector used to save user files. Indicates if the storage connetor is enabled or disabled. GlobalAccelerator (dict) --- Indicates the Global Accelerator properties. Indicates if Global Accelerator for directory is enabled or disabled. PreferredProtocol (string) --- Indicates the preferred protocol for Global Accelerator.

nested_params.name: StreamingExperiencePreferredProtocol
nested_params.description: Indicates the type of preferred protocol for the streaming experience.

nested_params.name: UserSettings
nested_params.description: Indicates the permission settings asscoiated with the user.

nested_params.name: Permission
nested_params.description: Indicates if the setting is enabled or disabled.

nested_params.name: MaximumLength
nested_params.description: Indicates the maximum character length for the specified user setting.

nested_params.name: ConnectorType
nested_params.description: The type of connector used to save user files.

nested_params.name: Status
nested_params.description: Indicates if the storage connetor is enabled or disabled.

nested_params.name: Mode
nested_params.description: Indicates if Global Accelerator for directory is enabled or disabled.

nested_params.name: PreferredProtocol
nested_params.description: Indicates the preferred protocol for Global Accelerator.
